column1: Kata Robata////I'm willing to erase that horrendous dessert from memory though. I've had great experiences at happy hour here
column2: where I tried fresh uni for the first time
column3: and gobbled down too many pork belly buns. Once
column4: my girlfriends and I even wore our tackiest Christmas sweaters here just begging to be judged
column5: but not only was the staff not snooty
column6: they complimented us on our fashion choices. Well played.
